long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This companion help to insert knowledge into your Kbase. It offer you a way to save and store all the interesting link you may need later and then build yourself a knowledge base. 

With a simple click on the extension icon, we'll autocomplete data about the active tab (title, favicon and url of course). 
You'll then be easily able to add it into your knowledge base with 1 click.
